title: Fated
description: When I'm rescued from captivity by a fierce Dragon warrior, I am both grateful and wary.Ronin is a Commander in the Mosauran Empire, and his species is one of the most feared in thegalaxy.When we crash on an Ice World, he detects a faint signal, on the surface, from another Mosauran ship. As we search for his people, I cannot deny that I'm drawn to him.He vows he will protect me and keep me safe. He claims that I’m his Fated One—his Ashaya.The more time we spend together, I begin to fall for my fierce protector. And now I find myself wondering: What would it be like to be fated to a Dragon?***This story was previously a very short novella titled "Fated to a Dragon Warrior" but has now been expanded into a full-length novel***
author: Jessica Grayson
